page.title: About Us
page.content:
BookMyParty is a brainchild of hardcore experts from the hospitality industry. The easy, swift and pain free way to find party venues, book parties and/or find the service provider for a party.

Bookmyparty.co.in went live with the objective of providing information on availability of party venues and related services to anyone with internet access. Today we are available in Delhi NCR and soon we shall be covering all the major cities of India.

Everything we do revolve around our obsession with providing our customers a memorable online experience when it comes to searching and booking party venues for any occasion. Our team of dedicated people is a phone call away and ensures all possible help in case you have a query.

If you are a venue owner or operator, click here to find out how to advertise your business to the thousands of people visiting BookMyParty who are looking for a venue for a party and increase your sales now!
